inclusion.criterion: independent to be standing and walking, with or without walking aids
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: interest to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cognitive impairments which precludes the ability to comprehend the questionnaires and functional tests included in the screening protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has itchy foot with localized scaling and maceration, but no underlying disease or severe sensorial/cognitive impairments.
